title: Frictional unemployment may be caused by

content.question: Frictional unemployment may be caused by

choices.label: people losing jobs when their skills become obsolete
people quitting jobs to look for better jobs
people dropping out of the job market after a considerable search
a general downturn in economic activity

content.answer: people quitting jobs to look for better jobs

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
